cups.unit_file:
[Unit]
Description=CUPS Scheduler
Documentation=man:cupsd(8)
After=network.target nss-user-lookup.target nslcd.service

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/bin/podman run --name cups-service-backend -p 631:631 {{.ImageName}}
ExecStop=/usr/bin/podman stop -t 10 cups-service-backend
ExecStopPost=/usr/bin/podman rm -f cups-service-backend
Restart=always
WantedBy=printer.target multi-user.target

cron.unit_file:
[Unit]
Description=Regular background program processing daemon
Documentation=man:cron(8)
After=remote-fs.target nss-user-lookup.target

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/bin/podman run --name cron-service-backend -v /etc/cron.daily:/etc/cron.daily -v /etc/cron.weekly:/etc/cron.weekly -v /etc/cron.monthly:/etc/cron.monthly {{.ImageName}}
ExecStop=/usr/bin/podman stop -t 10 cron-service-backend
ExecStopPost=/usr/bin/podman rm -f cron-service-backend
Restart=always

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target

packagekit.unit_file:
[Unit]
Description=PackageKit Daemon
ConditionPathExists=!/run/ostree-booted
Wants=network-online.target

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/bin/podman run --name packagekit-service-backend --privileged --ipc=host --net=host --pid=host -e HOST=/host -v /run:/run -v /var/log:/var/log -v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime -v /:/host -v /run/dbus/system_bus_socket:/run/dbus/system_bus_socket -v /tmp:/tmp {{.ImageName}}
ExecStop=/usr/bin/podman stop -t 10 packagekit-service-backend
ExecStopPost=/usr/bin/podman rm -f packagekit-service-backend
Restart=always

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
